titles.title: HP242 Mine eyes have seen the glory of the coming of the Lord

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines:
He has sounded forth the trumpet that shall never call retreat;
He is sifting out the hearts of men before his judgement-seat:
O be swift, my soul, to answer him; be jubilant, my feet!
Our God is marching on:
Glory, glory, alleluia! Glory, glory, alleluia!
Glory, glory, alleluia! Our God is marching on.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In the beauty of the lilies Christ was born across the sea,
With a glory in his bosom that transfigures you and me;
As he died to make men holy, let us live to make men free,
While God is marching on:
Glory, glory, alleluia! Glory, glory, alleluia!
Glory, glory, alleluia! While God is marching on.
